```{r, echo = FALSE, message = FALSE}
library(ggplot2)
library(sjPlot)
```

```{r adjust_plot_range, cache = TRUE}
# sample data set
library(sjmisc)
data(efc)
# show frequencies of relationship-variable and
# retrieve plot object
gp <- sjp.frq(efc$e15relat, printPlot = FALSE)
# show current plot
plot(gp$plot)
# show adjusted plot
adjust_plot_range(gp$plot)



```
